Member Function Documentation

XFcCPUInfo* XFcCPUInfo::create (    )  [static]
 

Static constructor.

Returns:
New XFcCPUInfo object if creation was successful, or NULL if creation was unsuccessful.

XFcCPUInfoARM* XFcCPUInfo::getARMInfo (    ) 
 

Returns ARM CPU specific information.

Note:
Use only if getValidField() returns XFCCPUINFO_ARM.

INT8 XFcCPUInfo::getValidField (    ) 
 

Returns type of available CPU information.

Returns:
One value from XFCCPUINFO_CPU enumeration. XFCCPUINFO_UNDEFINED if no CPU information is available.
See also:
XFCCPUINFO_CPU

CPU information for ARM CPUs if mValidField equals XFCCPUINFO_ARM.

Determines the type of CPU information.
